body: They were all released exclusively for the PC-98.
Touhou 1's Japanese name is Rei'iden, Touhou 2's Fuumaroku, and Touhou 3's Yumejiku.

Later that year on the 23rd of December 1997 Touhou 3 Phantasmagoria of Dim.Dream released. Touhou 3 sold 150 copies, now take that with a grain of salt because I got that from Megapig9001 and I can't find the source.

Touhou 1 Highly Responsive to Prayers & Touhou 2 Story of Eastern Wonderland both released in the 15th of August 1997 at Comiket 52 as they were both in development at the same time. Touhou 1 sold 30 copies according to ZUN while touhou 2 sold 50 copies.
Also, retroactively I now realize that Spamton might be referencing touhou.
